errors.error_description: The `conda install` command is missing the `-c conda-forge` channel argument, which is required to find the `kedro` package, causing the command to fail.
correction_candidates: conda config --add channels conda-forge && conda install kedro

errors.error_description: The command to install from the `main` branch uses an incorrect URL format (`/tree/main`), which is for browsing the repository on GitHub, not for `pip` installation.
correction_candidates: git clone https://github.com/kedro-org/kedro && cd kedro && pip install .
